Title: Towards an automation of the traceability of bugs from development logs: a study based on open source software
Published: EASE '15 Proceedings of the 19th International Conference on Evaluation and Assessment in Software Engineering
Elements_risk_assessment: It's not a paper about the location of the bug, and they don't see commits. They are interested in linking/mapping
UseOF-SZZ: To identify bugs and to compare how the defect-fixing changes are recorded
Summary: The aim is design a framework that automates the process of synchronizing and filling the gaps of the development logs and bug issue data for open source software projects.
Outcome: They designed an automatic approach to re-align the two databases, filling the gaps
